ygData.subject: Re: Out of the Fire - Kane
ygData.msgSnippet: (Rdahl, I meant Hot Spot crashed to the ground onto his chest, he s kind of KOd.  Also, RoboRick, Unicron s response to Hot Rod will be in a seperate e-mail.

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Rdahl, I meant Hot Spot crashed to the ground onto his chest, he's kind of 
KOd.  Also, RoboRick, Unicron's response to Hot Rod will be in a seperate 
e-mail.  And that missile fired at you as fire at a downward angle, and 
Vehement is high in the air, it wouldn't fly towards him)

The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Nemesis
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/
Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Reflector/Serpentor:



A few shots struck against Demon Wulf's armor, but the large Vok made robot 
ignored them.  He raised his blade, firing off a seeking missile at Demise's 
back.  He raised his free palm, firing off a white-yellow orb of energy with 
the force of a grenade at the CF.

---

Flesh Ripper deactivated his pain circuits, buying time before they were 
overrun.  He fired another ten rapid optic blasts at Demise's already damaged 
optic.

He pressed the palm of his free hand on the Predacon's chest and blue orb 
shot at the chest point blank with the effect of an EMP blast, that wouldn't 
harm Flesh Ripper.

---

Dark Claw, still flying up, avoided all the shots coming towards him.  He 
formed two black orbs of energy in his palms, throwing both at the CF, each 
having the power of a charge.

---

Dark One was 75% done with Breakdown, and kept up his work.  Suddenly 
multiple shots struck him and sent him forward.  "Traitors..." he yelled.  He 
got up, firing off three plasma bolts at DragonFly from his rifle.  He 
activated Breakdown despite being finished with repairs.  He'd need an edge.  
And Breakdown would need a second to come online fully.

---

Pyro, Hiss, and Scavenger both remained down, but in stable conditions.

---

Hot Spot slowly tried to get up, despite the gash in his chest from 
Headstrong's most recent attack.

---

Groove remained laying down, slowly slipping into stasis lock.

---

Blades regained his stability in the air and launched off two rockets at 
Abominous' left shoulder.

---

First Aid turned away from Firedrill and ran over to Hot Spot.  "You 
alright?" he asked, already knowing the answer and powering up his laser 
welder.

---

Streetwise remained in stasis lock.

---

The cannon EndBringer tried to wrench was bigger than his arm and only let 
out a near inaudible whine as it moved a little.  Both cannons locked onto 
EndBringer and fired a total of four energy-signature seeking missiles at the 
Predacon.

---

Predator avoided Firearm's weapons, the resulting shrapnel destroying other 
missiles heading for him.  But the force of the explosions sent him rocketing 
backwards, slamming to his back.

He sat upright with a large charred chest, firing off two rockets at Firearm.

---

Choran fired four optic blasts, intercepting the incoming missiles.  He 
raised his rifle and took careful aim, and fired his weapon in an arc.  Ten 
rapid shots at Iron Raptor, five at Charon, and another ten at Zardus' 
abdomen.  

(Just for anyone who's confused by this, CHORAN is my character, CHARON is 
Airly's.

---

Shockwave simply fired another blast, only this one laser.  It intercepted 
the bullets and the part of the blast that didn't destroy the bullets 
continued on towards the source of the rounds.  Incarcinator.

The Emperor transformed to his biped mode and activated his feet boosters, 
getting a move on.  At the same time a missile launcher appeared in his left 
hand and he gripped it, already having a new strategy.

---

Unitron raised his left arm, and out of the forearm came a small shield about 
seven feet in diameter and made of metal.  He moved the new shield in front 
of the enemy weapons fire, including an incoming missile from the Element 
(S).  The explosions sent him flying back a few feet.  His shield was lightly 
scratched from the lasers and bullets, and dented from the missile.

He formed a missile launcher in his right hand and fired off two rockets at 
the Cybertronian Fire.

He turned his head slightly and opened his mouth, firing off a single ball of 
green flames at Hot Rod's abdomen.

---

Firestarter cursed, his attacks on Iron Raptor being deflected by her 
consort.  Arming another pair of missiles, he fired two of them off at the 
Cybertronian Fire.  He armed his laser weaponry, firing off five rapid laser 
bolts before he had to turn sharply to avoid weapons fire from the Element 
(S) and CF autoguns.

---

Scattershot gave a weird grin and turned, seeing the Oblitercon mercenary 
team leader being shot by someone.  "Don't know who you are, but I don't want 
to be anywhere near Nemesis and the snake." he raised his rifle, firing off 
twenty-five armor piercing rounds at Dragonfly's abdomen, flying through the 
air towards that robot, but maintaining his altitude.

---

He saw the outline of some objects coming at him.  Double Punch fired off a 
spray of acid at them from his tail and smiled painfully as the remains of 
the charges hit the ground, covered with acid and slowly melting, some of the 
acid flowing from the charges to the ground.

He raised his left pincher, firing off two seeking missiles at the outline of 
a robot that was Scyther.

---

Manterror fired off two ion disks, intercepting some of the shots heading for 
him, the praying mantis robot avoiding most of the others as he rocketed into 
the sky, still going up as he acted, only a few shots striking him and doing 
little damage.

He raised both arms, firing off three ion disks at Darkfate from one arm and 
two ion disks at Atilla from the other.

---

Injector fired off two stinger missiles from his left launcher in his hand 
and intercepted all the shots heading for him.  He raised his free arm that 
held the launcher he hadn't fired with.  He fired off two stinger missiles at 
Underground.

His optics charged and ten rapid optic blasts shot out at Sharpclaws.

---

Vehement watched as he spiraled upside down.  He saw a single laser blast 
lance out and intercept a missile heading for him.  Two missiles and a blast 
from Darkfate passed by him and left craters in the ground which was steadily 
approaching the Archbishop, but one missile struck Vehement.  It left a small 
dent where it had hit, the thick layers of armor rather helpful in events 
like this.

Despite the pain which Vehement didn't show in the slightest, the missile 
brought something else.  The force of the explosion helped him upright 
himself, and the Archbishop was launched upward, approaching the heavens 
steadily.

He raised his right 'cannon' that was his right hand and pointed it at a 
target.  Out launched two energy-signature seeking missiles at Killfest.

He raised his left hand, palm extended, a sonic wave shot out at Magnus 
Prime's torso.

---

Reflector raised his left arm and two missiles launched out and prematurely 
exploding.  He was unharmed by the result except for a few laser bolts and 
the shrapnel that got through and cut his body.  He cursed the heathens and 
raised his other arm.  Both barrels fired off two missiles each.

Two energy-signature seeking missiles fired off at Deepfear.  One regular 
missile headed for the CF, and another ES seeking missile headed for 
Perceptor.

---

Serpentor transformed to biped mode, Nemesis Enforcer's battered bodies 
several yards away now.  He raised his plasma launcher, still laughing at 
Nemesis' misfortune.  He fired off two powerful blasts from his launcher at 
the Cybertronian Fire.

He fired a single charged optic blast at Zardus to get the fool's attention.
